Replies.Reply: The world of investing can be a jungle.
Bulls.
Bears.   Danger at every turn.
That's why we at Stratton Oakmont pride ourselves on being the best.
Trained professionals to guide you through the financial wilderness.
Stratton Oakmont. Stabilty.
Twenty five grand to the first cocksucker to nail a bullseye!
Watch and learn, people!
One.   Two.      Throw!!
The year I turned 26, I made 49 million dollars as the head of my own brokerage firm--
--which really pissed me off because it was three shy of a million a week.
Hey, my Ferrari was white, like Don Johnson's in Miami Vice.
See that humongous estate down there? That's my house.
My wife, Naomi, the Duchess of Bay Ridge, Brooklyn, a former model and Miller Lite girl.
Yeah, she was the one blowing me in the Ferrari, so put your dick back in your pants.
In addition to Naomi and my two perfect kids, I own a mansion, private jet, six cars, three horses, two vacation homes and a 170 foot yacht.
I also gamble like a degenerate, drink like a fish, fuck hookers maybe five times a week and have three different Federal agencies looking to indict me.
Oh yeah, and I love drugs.
Check this out -- despite my completely fucked-up state, I could fly straight while still seeing two of everything.
Ya guzza git hazarous doozy pay, buddy.
Yes, on a daily basis I take enough drugs to sedate greater Long Island.
I take Quaaludes for my back, fifteen to twenty a day.
I use Xanax to stay focused, ambien to sleep, pot to mellow out, cocaine to wake up and morphine because it's awesome.
But of all the drugs under God's blue heaven, there's one that's my absolute favorite.
Enough of this shit'll make you invincible, able to conquer the world and eviscerate your enemies.
I'm not talking about this. I'm talking about this.

Money doesn't just buy you a better life -- better food, better cars, better pussy -- it also makes you a better person. You can give generously to the church of your choice or the political party. You can save the fucking spotted owl with money.
But most of all, in any country in the world, money can buy you love.
With that in mind, at the tender age of 22, after marrying my girlfriend Teresa--
Nope.   No problem at all.
A million dollars? I could only imagine what a douchebag that guy must be.
Had to do something to stand out.
Great.   Yeah.
You want to know what money sounds like? Visit a trading floor on Wall Street. Fuck this, shit that. Cock, cunt, asshole. I couldn't believe how these guys talked to each other--
I was hooked within seconds.
It was like mainlining adrenaline.
No.   Thanks though.
Actually, I'm good with 7-Up.
You can get high during the day and still function?
I gotta say, I'm really excited about being part of your team.
Wife.   She cuts hair.
For the next six months I learned the ways of Wall Street.
That fall I passed my Series 7.
My first day as a stockbroker, a future Master of the Universe.
They called it Black Monday.
L.F. Rothschild, a company that had been in business since 1883, closed its doors within a month.
You work too much as it is.
We're not pawning anything. I'm gonna be a millionaire, Teresa.
"Nobody Beats the Wiz".      I could be a stock boy.
No one's hiring brokers right now, sweetie.
I'm looking for Investor's Center?
Jordan Belfort, I called earlier.
Where are your quotrons?
Six cents a share? Who buys this crap?
The spread on these is huge.
Wait a second. You're telling me if I sell two thousand dollars worth of stock, my commission is a thousand bucks?
The reason I'm calling is that an extremely exciting investment opportunity crossed my desk today.
And as a wise man once told me, my only responsibility was to put meat on the table.
Yeah.
Jordan Belfort.
Stock broker.
Seventy grand last month.
Seventy two actually.
And he did quit his job, which I thought was a little weird.
There were other things about him too, like his phosphorescent white teeth and the fact that he wore horn rims with clear lenses to look more Waspy. He also married his first cousin --
He was also a closet drug fiend.
The weird thing was when he'd do crack, his face would contort into this bizarre, frozen mask like the Phantom of the Opera.
Omigod, I fuckin' love you!!
I knew I had to make him my partner.
Which turned out to be a great move - Donnie was a fast learner who transitioned into the penny stock business quickly.
So within months we started our own firm out of an abandoned auto body shop.
the time all middling pot dealers.
--see everyone wants to get rich, so you're already half way there by the time the call starts.
Brad, the guy I really wanted, took a pass, since he'd become the Quaalude king of Bayside.
They were absolute morons, my friends, but like I always said--
Give me them young, hungry and stupid and in no time I'll make them rich.
You like it?
They're small, I know, but the stones are really high quality.
Then what?
In five years the Corleone family will be completely legitimate.
Rich people don't buy penny stocks.
Because they're too smart, that's why not.
Robbie Feinberg.
Or the Sea Otter.
Chester Ming even, the Depraved Chinaman, with his giant panda head.
Or Nicky Koskoff, who I called Rugrat because--
Well, you can probably figure that out for yourself.

But what if they didn't sound like jerk-offs? What if I took this bunch of nincompoops and molded them in my own image? I reinvented the company, gave it a new image, a new name. Something patrician, blue-blooded, something that reeked of tradition and anti-
Gentlemen, welcome to Stratton Oakmont.   The clients we've gone after in the past -- they're done.
In military terms it's like carpet-
No one buys stock unless he thinks it's going up and going up now.

--and once Kodak settles the lawsuit, institutions will be permitted to buy their shares in large blocks again. And when that happens, which is any day now, what do you think will happen to the price of Kodak stock?
Then you lower your voice.
Believe me, sir, you will not be sorry.
Then you wait. Whoever speaks first loses. At this point, where are we in the sale? Chester?
No, you sweet and sour douchebag!
He doesn't know, he needs to think, he's gotta ask his wife!
Your only regret will be that I didn't call you six months ago.
All right.
Give me 300 shares.
1200 shares.
I'll take 5000 shares.
Everybody have a good week?
I'd like to read you something.
have her head shaved!
FYI, Danielle tells me she's using the money for breast implants! Is this a great company or what?!!
Word spread throughout Wall Street -- I was becoming a legend.
A total fucking hatchet job.
That conniving little twat!
"The Wolf of Wall Street".
"Jordan Belfort, a twisted version of Robin Hood who takes from the rich and gives to himself and his merry band of brokers".
The hell's all this?
Forbes had made me a superstar.
of college overnight and blew whatever allowance they had on a new suit from our in-house tailor.
Not this guy though -- what the fuck is he even doing here? He read the Forbes article, too, but he already had a job.
Within months, we doubled in size, moved to even bigger offices.
It was a madhouse, a greed-fest, with equal parts cocaine, testosterone and body fluids.
I had to declare the office a fuck-
Actually the madness started on our very first day, when one of our brokers, Ben Jenner, christened the elevator by getting a blowjob from a sales assistant.
Her name was Pam and   to her credit, she did have   an amazing technique, with this   wild twist and jerk motion.
Eventually Ben married her, which was pretty amazing considering she blew every guy in the office.
He got depressed and killed himself three years later.
Anyway, in an attempt to maintain order, I hired my dad Max as defacto CFO and head of the Gestapo.
We called him Mad Max because of his hair-trigger temper, which could be set off by something as innocuous as a ringing telephone.
But then the weirdest thing would happen. Though he'd never been near England, he'd pick up the phone and affect an ever-so-slight British accent.
This was his other persona -- the super polite, ever-gracious Sir Max.
And become Mad Max all over again.
What if he gets hurt?
Get some tranq darts.
Can you stop him?
The guys titter at "business expenses."
Will you calm down --
Donnie ordered sides.
You tell me, Dad.
made you wear a condom unless you gave them a hefty tip, which I always did.
Then came NASDAQs, who were pretty, but not great, usually in the two to three hundred dollar range.
Finally there were pink sheets, skanks, the bottom of the barrel.
They usually cost a hundred or less, and if you didn't wear a condom, you'd get a penicillin shot the next day and pray your dick didn't fall off.
Not that we didn't fuck them, too.
Give us a minute, will you, guys?
Doctors, what do they know? I'm on like twenty different medications.
It was obscene -- in the normal world. But who wanted to live there?
But, everybody, keep this in mind.
Exactly. We do our own IPO's and we will print money.
They can take their Harvard asses under our desks and suck our cocks.
How soon can you get the paperwork filed?
It's a simple fucking question.
What?
The quaalude was first synthesized in 1951 by an Indian doctor --
What're you saying, buddy?
Naomi.
You like it? I just got it. I guess it's okay. Six bedrooms, two hot-tubs, one off the master suite overlooking the water. You like to jet-ski?
You're telling me you've never jet-
What?    You just got here.   Stay.
With what?
The day I met Naomi was the day I truly became the Wolf. Every guy wanted her -- so I had to have her.
Bay Ridge.      That's near Staten Island?
You're Italian?
That explains it then.
You're a Duchess. The Duchess of Bay Ridge.
How come?
Married people can't have friends?
She designs panties?! Jesus fucking Christ!
Sounds like something I might invest in. Venture capital.
Absolutely.
Think, Jordan, think! How can you get up to her apartment?!
God, please help me. How can I fuck this girl?
That's it, you're leaving. You're going home to your wife.
As you can probably guess, I fucked her goddamn brains out.
For eleven seconds.
I'm sorry, I--
Yeah, but I'm still hard.
I couldn't get enough.
Hold still, don't move.
Watch the potholes!
I thought you were at the beach house, I--
I'm not. I'm sorry.        I made a mistake, okay?
I felt horrible.
Three days later I filed for divorce and moved Naomi into the apartment.
Say what you will, but the Duchess did have style. She brought in a decorator, feng shui'd the place--
Thank you, Nicholas.
Where were they? In the bedroom?
The motherfucker stole fifty grand in cash and jewelry.
I just want my stuff back, okay?
You were high, things got out of control, I get it. Believe me I do, I have a Phd in debauchery.
Just give me the money, give me the jewelry, and we'll forget the whole thing.
Nicholas. You could fuck a baby sheep as far as I care, on my brand new fucking sofa. What I won't stand for is being robbed.
I'll ask you one last time.
Fine.
I finally called the cops, mainly to save Nicholas's life.
I gave them each a thousand bucks and told them what Nicholas had done. Then they kicked his ass.
Loyalty, like I said. Which was the key component to my incredible fucking success.
own stock on paper, but kick the profits back to me after I drove the price through the roof.
The SEC knew I was doing something shady, but they couldn't figure out what the fuck it was.
be the voice of doom.
It's under control. Will you relax already?
The SEC sent two lawyers down to review our files, so I set them up in our conference room.
Then I had it bugged and the air conditioning locked till it felt like Antarctica in there.
So here they were, looking for a smoking gun while I was firing a bazooka right under their noses.
See an IPO is an initial public offering, the first time a stock is offered for sale to the general population.
Alone in a private room, Jordan unloads a small suitcase filled with stacks and stacks of hundred dollar bills.
blowout for the Gods before I settled down for good.
A hundred Strattonites flew in with fifty hookers and enough drugs to open a pharmacy.
All told, the weekend cost me almost two million dollars--
But the wedding was like something out of a fairy tale--
look on as Jordan and Naomi walk up the aisle.

Of course after that bachelor party, the Duke needed a few penicillin shots so he could safely consummate the marriage.
It's so nice to see you again.
Careful now.     You ready?
Your wedding present.       Check out the name.
For three weeks we sailed the Naomi through the Caribbean--
--eventually taking her home to Long Island, where we'd bought a house.
Seven acres on the Gold Coast of Long Island--
--the most expensive real estate in the world, with maids, cooks, landscapers, you name it.
We even had two guards who worked in shifts, both named Rocco.
It   was heaven on earth.
The fuck are you doing?!
What?!
What?    No!    Naomi!
I can explain everything.
No, really. Donnie and me, we're investing in a condo development in Venice.
California, baby.
Duchess, come on.
Fuck. Naomi!    Why are you so mad?
You're an aspiring landscape architect?! But what happened to wine connoisseur? Oh wait, that was last month!
I wasn't flexing my arms. You're just lucky to have a husband who's in such great shape. Now get over here and kiss me!
Where the fuck were you last night?
My morning ritual. First I'd get up and fight with Naomi about whatever I did the night before.
Next it was a steam so I could sweat out whatever drugs were still in my system.
After that I'd assess the damage.
What kind of maniac abuses eye drops?
Then I'd get dressed, take my "back pills" to get me started, then attempt to make up with her.
Hey, Skylar.
Does Daddy get to kiss both his girls?
C'mon, Nay, please. You know how sorry I am. I swear I--
C'mon, why are you doing this?
I wouldn't do that if I were you Mommy. I think Mommy should hear a story before she decides to please herself like that.
Now because he was very security-
So smile, Mommy! You're on Candid Camera!
The good thing about living with a world-class ballbreaker is they make all the other ballbreakers in your life a little easier to take.
Steve here yet?
Good.   Cuz we have a problem.
He's got nothing better to do on the day of the biggest IPO in this firm's history?!
The Cobbler.    Ready to get rich?
Steve Madden, the shoe designer, was a childhood friend of Donnie's, but I didn't hold that against him. Remember those ads, those giant-headed girls with bug eyes wearing those big clunky shoes?
only a million bucks.
The company blew up and we were now taking it public. It was the biggest deal we'd ever done and the hottest IPO on Wall Street.
they'll push the shit out of this stock.
All right, let's hear it for Steve Madden and the wonderful Mary Lou!
I want everybody to look down.
I don't care if you graduated from Harvard or Bumfuck University or never got past fourth fucking grade! That phone is the great equalizer!
Jordan takes off his GOLD WATCH, flings it to the Crowd.

And if anyone here thinks I'm crazy, get the fuck out and get a job at McDonald's, because that's where you fucking belong! But before you depart this room full of winners, I want you to take a good look at the person next to you, because one day in the not-so-

So you listen to me and listen carefully. Are you behind on your credit card bills? Good. Pick up the phone and start dialing. Is your landlord threatening to evict you? Good. Pick up the phone and start dialing. Does your girlfriend think you're a fucking loser? Pick up the phone and start fucking dialing! I want you to deal with your problems by becoming rich! I want you to go out and spend money! Leverage yourself, back yourself into a corner, let the consequences of failure become so fucking unthinkable that you'll have no choice but to do whatever it takes to win!

You have an obligation here, people! To your clients! To this firm! An obligation to yourself, godammit! You ram Steve Madden stock down your clients' throats and make them choke on it till they buy 20,000 shares! Be aggressive! Be ferocious! Be telephone fucking terrorists!!
Of course I couldn't have done this without help. I'd leaked the word on Wall Street that Stratton was a buyer up until twenty. So not only were we pushing Madden, all the big firms were too.
As long as they knew I'd buy the shares back at the top of the market, they'd drive the price up as high as I fucking wanted.
Of the two million shares being offered for sale, a million belonged to me, held in phony accounts by my ratholes. Once the price hit the high teens, I--
Like I said before, who gives a shit? As always, the point is this--
Janet, baby.    Drink.
Who?
Barry?
The F-B-fucking-I?
What's his problem?
But my goddamn wedding video?
What? He wants me to rat on myself?
Can you bug him or something, tap his phone?
Maybe I should call him, see what he wants.
Patrick? Hey! C'mon aboard!
Plank's right down there.
It did. I do.
Oh, they're just friends.
Give us a minute, okay?
Can I get a glass? Got wine open or any kinda booze. Shrimp and lobster're over there if you're hungry.
I have something for you, I just gotta find it. Have a seat, will ya? Ever been on one of these before?
I mean, one like this. Just had her extended to put a chopper on the back.
Names and addresses of every guest at my wedding. Friends, clients. I even threw in the seating chart.
That's what I'm saying. You guys take on real crime. Which is why I'm so curious: what do you think we did?
I understand.

-- sure, get you back to the real criminals --
You sure you don't want anything to drink? Water for your pal?
Rumor is your started out in finance. Even got your broker's license before you joined the bureau.
Ever regret it? Giving up the money-crazed, pin-striped life?
Whattaya pull in working at the bureau, if you don't mind me asking. 50-60K a year?
S'crazy, the world we live in, the jobs with real value, the ones we should appreciate -- firefighters, teachers, FBI agents -- those are the ones we pay the least.

That's one thing I like about what I do, the opportunity to make that right. Take this kid we had interning last year. Didn't want to be a broker, wanted to be an environmental scientist or something, he had a student loan debts up to his eyeballs. Anyway, his mom gets sick, all they can afford is third-rate care. -- those are friends --

As he watches them pull away, seething --
He was a numbers guy, a follow-the-
Swiss cheese, Naomi, what do you fucking think?
Rugrat set up a meeting with a Swiss Banker he knew from law school who could launder our money, but it wasn't till noon the next day.
I knew if I timed my lude intake right, I'd sleep through the entire overnight flight.
At four p.m. I popped a few ludes, which started kicking in by the time I finished our sales meeting.
By dinner I popped a few more on top of some cocktails and an valium or two. The slur phase.
By eight thirty I'd done a few more and pretty much lost my motor skills. This was the drool phase.
And by ten I didn't know who or what I was doing -- the amnesia phase. We boarded the plane just before midnight.
Sweetheart! Look at you!
Donnie.   Donnie, wake up.
Untie me, shitbag. You think this is funny?
Why?
This was fucking great. I hadn't laundered a dime yet and already I was under arrest.

But before he could even get a hemorrhoid--
Nice to make your acquaintance.
I'm curious about your bank secrecy laws.
Under what circumstances would you be obligated to cooperate with an FBI or U.S. Justice Department investigation?
Ca depend?      Ca depend on what?
What I'm asking, you Swiss dick, is are you going to fuck me over.
Unless it was an investigation into stock fraud -- which is a crime in Switzerland. Then you'd have to cooperate.
Was that yodeling I just heard or did you just say what I thought you said?
He was telling me to use a rathole. Problem was: sneaking a U.S. rathole into Switzerland was a chance I couldn't take. What I needed was somebody with a European passport.
Surprise.
I'd like us to go to Switzerland tomorrow so you can open an account. I'll fund it, and I'll pay you really well for your trouble.
Next month maybe you can fly to New York and we can start moving the cash.
It is, and it's illegal too. Of course if you ever got in trouble, I'd come forward in two seconds, say I duped you, but even still.
you'll spend at least ten thousand pounds per month out of the account, okay?

Sure, that'd be great.
It's that obvious, huh?
Is she fucking hitting on me?

Aunt Emma pulls back slightly.
When I got home, I realized there was no way Aunt Emma could smuggle that much cash by herself. I racked my brain for another person with a foreign passport.

-- because the following month, over the course of six round-

C'mon, stand up!

I can crawl, like Skylar!

I took a CPR class when the baby was learning to swim. Just for the record, I want it noted: not for a second did I even think about letting him choke to death, even though it would've saved me an awful lot of headaches.

because he wouldn't rat Donnie out. They never found his gun, though, so they finally had to let him go.

Five years ago when I started Stratton with Donnie Azoff, I knew the day would eventually come when I'd be moving on. It's truly with a heavy heart that I tell you that day is here.

Before I go, there's something I want to remind you all, and that's this -- Stratton Oakmont is bigger than any one person, even me.

Armani suits, who spends her winters in the Bahamas and her summers in the Hamptons!

-- this seemed the most civilized way to transport it overseas.
